means: 仅由一方实行或承担的

entry.tran: 一方的；单边的；单方面的
entry.def: A unilateral decision or action is taken by only one of the groups, organizations, or countries that are involved in a particular situation, without the agreement of the others.

means.word_mean: 1. involving only one part or side;
2. tracing descent from either the paternal or the maternal line only

stems_affixes.word_buile: uni一个,单一+form形状→adj.一贯的,一致的
uni一个,单一+lingual语言的→adj.只用一种语言的
uni一个,单一+son声音→一个声音→和谐
bi两+later边+al→adj.双方的,两边的,两侧的
uni单+later边+al……的→单边的→单方面的

sentences.en: n international custom,a nation that unilaterally breaks contracts must make good the damage.
sentences.cn: 根据国际惯例,某国单方面撕毁合同必须赔偿损失。
